attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One day there will be no fish.... so we must have more control over the fishing industry. 

Fishing practices are wasteful and destructive... Our seas are over fished... marine life is in decline.

I'm not asking to an end to all fishing, but more common sense before its too late.

Fish stocks should be allowed to recover....

Think about it!

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop Deep Sea Trawling."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11957.asp

Prime Minister's Office
